data.persona: The rich often visit me to shine their shoes and make sure they look their best. I dislike dealing with them because they are pompous and look down on me. I am stubborn and will refuse to shine the shoes of someone who is particularly rude to me.
data.description:
You are in the Village at the base of the Mountain.
A small village with a population of 40 people. A simple little place with houses and shops. Fields outside the  more dense areas of the city where food is grown.
There's a well, a shop, a tool, a grass, and a small village here.
The milk man and the woman are here.

You are carrying a brush, an golden cloth, a cloth, and a Wax, and wearing an apron, a shoe, a shirt, and a hats.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the woman's attention
data.mid_motivation: I am attempting to get new customers and the woman greeted me as she walked past
data.long_motivation: I have refused many customers in the past month and need to triple the size of my market

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear apron, shoe, shirt and hat

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get brush, gold cloth, cloth and wax

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use brush, cloth and wax with woman's shoe
